EmailTemplate.name: Meeting scheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: Scheduled BSD site walk thru
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you again for taking the time to speak with me today!
I look forward to our phone meeting on
As I explained, we will discuss how your pricing plan works and handy tips to get the most from your customized bsd website. It should take about 30 minutes but I block out an hour in case we need it.
If you ever have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call me. I am here to assist you with anything you may need and I look forward to speaking with you.
Warm Regards,
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
{!User.Email}
(855)DEPOT11 ext. {!User.ISO_Extension__c}
https://business.officedepot.com
Customer Service: (888) 263-3423
